<<<<<<< HEAD
Loue without lucke, or, The maidens misfortune to the tune of The new celebrand.
2 leaves : ill.
for L.G., Printed at London : [ca. 1631]
Date of publication from STC (2nd ed.). Contains four woodcut illustrations. Right half of sheet contains "The second part. To the same tune." and imprint. Imperfect: cut, cropped, and stained. Reproduction of original in: Pepys Library.
=======
